body:
I consent

On Tue, Nov 5, 2019, 10:33 PM Talha Cross <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> The only "public domain please" standout so far is @soc1c
> <https://github.com/soc1c>, and that is a recommendation not a hard line,
> as far as I can see?
>
> Yeah, it's a recommendation. That said, I believe specs require a
> different licensing format than actual software. So you would have to
> investigate Creative Commons or similar if you want to consider something
> that is not Public Domain.
>
> â€”
